metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Set preferences for validating digital signatures
Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
Send a document to get signatures from
Create the appearance of a certificate-based signature
Customizing signature workflows using seed values

subsection_analysis.refined_text: You can easily fill, sign, and share your documents using Acrobat's Fill & Sign tool. Types of PDF forms

To complete and sign PDF forms, open the form in Acrobat and then select E-Sign from the global bar. You can now fill in the form fields and sign the form using the sign tools described in the following topics.

Interactive forms: These contain fields that you can select and fill in. Flat forms: These do not have interactive fields. It could be a paper form or PDF that hasnt been optimized for form filling. The Fill & Sign tool automatically detects the form fields like text fields, comb fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons. You can manually add text and other symbols anywhere on the form using the Fill & Sign tool if required. You can complete the forms by entering information and adding your signa...

You can set verification preferences in advance so digital signatures are valid when you open a PDF and verification details appear with the signature. When Digital Signatures are validated, an icon appears in the document message bar to indicate the signature status. In the Preferences dialog box, from under categories, select Signatures. From the Verification box in the Digital Signatures panel, select More...

You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the Prepare Form tool or enabling the Fill & Sign tools. Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill & Sign tool to fill in flat forms.
